messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] fun ideas for winter time
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks! Kristen ... From: starsuncloud@cs.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday, January 03, 2003 11:30 AM Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] fun
messages.messageBody:
Thanks!
Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: starsuncloud@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, January 03, 2003 11:30 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] fun ideas for winter time


In a message dated 1/3/03 6:49:45 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I need some ideas for fun stuff to do with kids in the winter that is low
or no cost. >>

They aren't all indoor ideas, but there's a long list of low cost fun and
games at our groups website pensacoaunschoolers.com
It's the list that I used in the SC conference workshop and includes some
messy stuff too.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
